## Choose a template

This repository has multiple PR templates. If this stub isn’t what you need, click **“Choose a template”** above the description and select one of:

- `feature.md`
- `bugfix.md`
- `refactor.md`
- `docs.md`
- `ci-cd.md`
- `maintenance.md`
- `general.md`

> Tip: You can also preselect via URL, e.g.  
> `.../compare/dev...<your-branch>?expand=1&template=feature.md`
